channel.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Prison of the Hated Pretender
channel.description:
In the newest episode of Fear of a Black Dragon, @Coalhada and I are discussing Prison of the Hated Pretender by @Gus.L. Our topic for the Expert Delve is "Daylight Dungeoneering." Check it out:
https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/fear-of-a-black-dragon/prison-of-the-hated-pretender

item.title: Fear of a Black Dragon - Prison of the Hated Pretender
item.dc:creator: @Rui
item.description:
@Rui wrote:

Just getting to this episode so sorry for the lateness of my reply.
I’m sure someone has mentioned this by now, but please add Midsommar to the list for daylight horror.
Predator is also an interesting reversal in that the monster is most effective during the day and the hero only fights back at night.

Read full topic
item.source: Fear of a Black Dragon - Prison of the Hated Pretender
